title: (24) Hager BB1199 Full Mortise Ball Bearing Hinge, Standard Weight, 5 Knuckle in Satin Stainless - retail over $1,000
item_description:
Hager BB1199 Full Mortise Ball Bearing Hinge, Standard Weight, 5 Knuckle in Satin Stainless - retail over $1,000

  • Seller States: (24) brand new sealed in a case 
  • Seller States: Each Hinge is over $54 - that means the lot is over $1,000
  • 4.5 x 4.5 
  • Features: Four ball bearings. Non-rising removable pin with tip and plug;
  • Knuckles: 5;
  • Fire Rating: Stainless steel model complies with NFPA80 requirements for use on fire rated door assemblies;
  • Material: Brass with Stainless Steel Pin, Stainless Steel with Stainless Steel Pin;
  • Notes: Furnished with fastener hole locations that conform to standards approved by ANSI A156.7;
  • Options:
    • NRP (Non-removable pin);
    • Stamped with UL logo when ordered for export.
    • Product Description: Full Mortise, Ball Bearing, Heavy Weight.
